title: unesco_heritage_Cathedral_and_Churches_of_Echmiatsin_and_the_Archaeological_Site_of_Zvartnots
text:
Name: Cathedral and Churches of Echmiatsin and the Archaeological Site of Zvartnots. short_description:

The cathedral and churches of Echmiatsin and the archaeological remains at Zvartnots graphically illustrate the evolution and development of the Armenian central-domed cross-hall type of church, which exerted a profound influence on architectural and artistic development in the region.

. date_inscribed: 2000. danger: 0. date_end: . longitude: 44.29514. latitude: 40.15931. area_hectares: 74.3. category_long: Cultural. category_short: C. Country name: Armenia. Region: Europe and North America. iso_code: am. transboundary: 0. rev_bis: .
